languages.text: "Соглашусь, Лорд-капитан. И астротраектории указывают, что большинства этих светил здесь изначально не было. Кто-то шпиговал ими данную систему, и не хотел бы я находиться здесь в тот момент — гравитационные течения должны были превратиться в настоящий хаос. Кому бы могло быть такое под силу? Может, друкари? Таскать звезды, словно они — их собственность, очень в духе этих проклятых ксеносов".

"I agree, Lord Cap'n. The stellar trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could have pulled off something like that? Was it Drukhari? Dragging stars around like they are their property is quite in character for those damn xenos."
languages.original_text: "Соглашусь, Лорд-капитан. И астротраектории указывают, что большинства этих светил здесь изначально не было. Кто-то шпиговал ими данную систему, и не хотел бы я находиться здесь в тот момент — гравитационные течения должны были превратиться в настоящий хаос. Кому бы могло быть такое под силу? Может, друкари? Таскать звезды, словно они — их собственность, очень в духе этих проклятых ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "I agree, Lord Captain. Astral trajectories also suggest that most of these stars had not been here initially. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to be here at that moment because gravity currents would become purely chaotic. Who could be able to do this? Maybe Drukhari? Carrying stars around as if they are one's property is quite in character for these damn xenos."

"I agree, Lord Captain. Astral trajectories also suggest that most of these stars had not been here initially. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to be here at that moment because gravity currents would become purely chaotic. Who could be able to do this? Maybe Drukhari? Carrying stars around as if they are one's property is quite in character for these damn xenos."

"I agree, Lord Captain. The astral trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could possess the power to do something of this magnitude? Maybe Drukhari? Dragging stars around as if they were one's property is quite in character for these damn xenos."

"I agree, Lord Captain. The astral trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could possess the power to do something of this magnitude? Maybe Drukhari? Dragging stars around as if they were one's property is quite in character for these damn xenos."

"I agree, Lord Cap'n. The stellar trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could have pulled off something like that? Was it Drukhari? Dragging stars around like they are their property is quite in character for those damn xenos."

languages.text: “我也同意，船长老大。这些恒星的轨迹表明，绝大部分恒星之前并不属于这个星系，不知是谁把这些恒星丢在了这个星系中。我可不想在这个星系里呆着，这里的重力流已经被搅得乱七八糟了。到底是谁有这么大的能耐？会不会是黑暗灵族？他们把恒星拖来拖去，就好像那些东西都是他们自己的东西一样，这确实很像那些该死的异形会干的事情。”
languages.original_text: "I agree, Lord Cap'n. The stellar trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could have pulled off something like that? Was it Drukhari? Dragging stars around like they are their property is quite in character for those damn xenos."

traits.locale_text: “我也同意，船长老大。这些恒星的轨迹表明，绝大部分恒星之前并不属于这个星系，不知是谁把这些恒星丢在了这个星系中。我可不想在这个星系里呆着，这里的重力流已经被搅得乱七八糟了。到底是谁有这么大的能耐？会不会是黑暗灵族？他们把恒星拖来拖去，就好像那些东西都是他们自己的东西一样，这确实很像那些该死的异形会干的事情。”

languages.text: « Tout à fait, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. D'ailleurs, les trajectoires stellaires suggèrent que la plupart de ces étoiles n'étaient pas là auparavant. Quelqu'un les entreposait dans ce système, et je n'aurais pas aimé me trouver ici à ce moment-là... Les courants gravitationnels devaient être incroyablement chaotiques. Qui a bien pu réussir un tel tour de force ? Les Drukharis ? Ça ressemblerait bien à ces maudits xénos de déplacer des étoiles comme si elles leur appartenaient. »
languages.original_text: "I agree, Lord Cap'n. The stellar trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could have pulled off something like that? Was it Drukhari? Dragging stars around like they are their property is quite in character for those damn xenos."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. D'ailleurs, les trajectoires stellaires suggèrent que la plupart de ces étoiles n'étaient pas là auparavant. Quelqu'un les entreposait dans ce système, et je n'aurais pas aimé me trouver ici à ce moment-là... Les courants gravitationnels devaient être incroyablement chaotiques. Qui a bien pu réussir un tel tour de force ? Les Drukharis ? Ça ressemblerait bien à ces maudits xénos de déplacer des étoiles comme si elles leur appartenaient. »

languages.text: "Ich sehe es genauso, Lord Cap'n. Die stellaren Flugbahnen deuten auch darauf hin, dass die meisten der Sterne hier früher nicht existierten. Irgendjemand hat sie in diesem System angehäuft und zum Glück war ich in dieser Zeit nicht hier – die Gravitationsströmungen bildeten bestimmt das reinste Chaos. Wer hätte so etwas bewerkstelligen können? Waren es Drukhari? Sterne zu verschieben, als würden sie einem gehören, sieht diesen verdammten Xenos ganz ähnlich."
languages.original_text: "I agree, Lord Cap'n. The stellar trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could have pulled off something like that? Was it Drukhari? Dragging stars around like they are their property is quite in character for those damn xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe es genauso, Lord Cap'n. Die stellaren Flugbahnen deuten auch darauf hin, dass die meisten der Sterne hier früher nicht existierten. Irgendjemand hat sie in diesem System angehäuft und zum Glück war ich in dieser Zeit nicht hier – die Gravitationsströmungen bildeten bestimmt das reinste Chaos. Wer hätte so etwas bewerkstelligen können? Waren es Drukhari? Sterne zu verschieben, als würden sie einem gehören, sieht diesen verdammten Xenos ganz ähnlich."

languages.text: «Estoy de acuerdo, Lord Capitán. Las trayectorias estelares también sugieren que antes la mayoría de estas estrellas no estaban aquí. Alguien las trajo a este sistema. No me habría gustado estar aquí cuando ocurrió, pues las corrientes gravitacionales debieron de ser absolutamente caóticas. Pero ¿quién podría hacer algo de esta magnitud? ¿Los Drukhari? A esos malditos xenos les pega llevarse estrellas como si fueran de su propiedad».
languages.original_text: "I agree, Lord Cap'n. The stellar trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could have pulled off something like that? Was it Drukhari? Dragging stars around like they are their property is quite in character for those damn xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy de acuerdo, Lord Capitán. Las trayectorias estelares también sugieren que antes la mayoría de estas estrellas no estaban aquí. Alguien las trajo a este sistema. No me habría gustado estar aquí cuando ocurrió, pues las corrientes gravitacionales debieron de ser absolutamente caóticas. Pero ¿quién podría hacer algo de esta magnitud? ¿Los Drukhari? A esos malditos xenos les pega llevarse estrellas como si fueran de su propiedad».

languages.text: 「同感です、ロード・キャプテン。恒星の軌跡から見ても、これらの星のほとんどは元々ここには存在していなかったようです。誰かがこの星系にかき集めていたのでしょう。あの時ここにいたくはなかった…重力の流れはまさに混沌そのものだったはずです。こんな真似をできる者がいるとすれば誰でしょう？デュカーリでしょうか？星々を自分の持ち物のように引きずり回すのは、あの忌々しい異種族どもにありがちなことですからね」
languages.original_text: "I agree, Lord Cap'n. The stellar trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could have pulled off something like that? Was it Drukhari? Dragging stars around like they are their property is quite in character for those damn xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「同感です、ロード・キャプテン。恒星の軌跡から見ても、これらの星のほとんどは元々ここには存在していなかったようです。誰かがこの星系にかき集めていたのでしょう。あの時ここにいたくはなかった…重力の流れはまさに混沌そのものだったはずです。こんな真似をできる者がいるとすれば誰でしょう？デュカーリでしょうか？星々を自分の持ち物のように引きずり回すのは、あの忌々しい異種族どもにありがちなことですからね」

languages.text: "Haklısınız Lord Kaptan. Yıldız yörüngelerine bakılırsa çoğu başka yerden gelmiş. Birileri yıldızları bu sisteme istifliyormuş. Keşke kendi gözümle görebilseydim, çekim kuvvetinden doğan akımlar müthiş bir keşmekeşe yol açmış olmalı. Böyle bir işi kim yapmış olabilir? Drukhariler mi? Yıldızlar kendi malıymış gibi onları sağa sola sürüklemek tam da o adi zenoların yapacağı bir şeye benziyor."
languages.original_text: "I agree, Lord Cap'n. The stellar trajectories also suggest that most of these stars didn't use to be here. Someone was hoarding them in this system, and I wouldn't like to have been here at that time — the gravitational currents would have been pure chaos. Who could have pulled off something like that? Was it Drukhari? Dragging stars around like they are their property is quite in character for those damn xenos."
